newsitem.title: USA: Group holds 10.2 pct BioTime stake.
newsitem.headline: Group holds 10.2 pct BioTime stake.

text.p: A group led by Greenbelt Corp said Monday it holds the equivalent of a 10.2 percent stake in BioTime Inc or 302,500 common shares.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its stake consists of 102,500 common shares purchased between January 1993 and June 1995 and warrants to buy 200,000 shares.
The group said it received the warrants as compensation for its financial consulting services. The warrants become exercisable beginning October 15.
Greenbelt Corp manages a small number of securities and acts as financial adviser to BioTime, according to the filing.
